buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Great Divide Mining Ltd (ASX:GDM) is pleased to announce that it today completed Definitive

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Upon achieving first gold production within 12 months, GDM will secure a further 36% interest, bringing its total ownership in CGM to 51%.

cash_payments_raw.justification: GDM will acquire an initial 15% equity stake in Challenger Gold Mines Pty Ltd (CGM), by investing $300,000.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Refurbishment of the modern Adelong Gold Plant, originally constructed in 2016/17, to resume production.Ongoing exploration and feasibility studies to expand the resource base beyond the current JORC 2012 Resource of 188,000 ounces.A commitment to rapidly advance the project to become a regional base for gold production.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: The project includes: •Refurbishment of the modern Adelong Gold Plant, originally constructed in 2016/17, to resume production.•Ongoing exploration and feasibility studies to expand the resource base beyond the current JORC 2012 Resource of 188,000 ounces.•A commitment to rapidly advance the project to become a regional base for gold production.

coverage_area_raw.justification: In May 2020, Adelong took control of the Adelong Goldfield which covers 70km2, comprising the old Adelong Gold Project situated in Southern NSW located approximately 20km from Tumut and 80km from Gundagai.

coverage_area_unit.justification: In May 2020, Adelong took control of the Adelong Goldfield which covers 70km2, comprising the old Adelong Gold Project situated in Southern NSW located approximately 20km from Tumut and 80km from Gundagai.

resource_size_desc.justification: The Project now carries a JORC (2012) Resource of 188,000oz

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Great Divide Mining (ASX:GDM) successfully completed a detailed and hands-on due diligence process onsite at the Adelong Gold Project

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Upon achieving first gold pour, GDM’s interest will increase to 51%, with Adelong Gold maintaining a 49% strategic interest.

cash_payments_raw.justification: GDM to invest $300,000 for an initial 15% stake in Challenger Gold Mines (CGM) following due diligence.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: Additional exploration and feasibility studies to expand gold resources within the Project Area.

interest_acquired_percent.justification:
GDM having completed Due Diligence on the CMPL assets, and being satisfied with the results, will now move
to finalise binding agreements which upon execution will enable GDM to acquire a 15% holding in CMPL and
become operator of CMPL.
